component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 本次更新智慧助手升级为 YOYO 助理，优化智慧视觉的交互操作方式，推荐您进行更新。
• 智慧助手升级为 YOYO 助理，新增支持发送图片、文档等交流互动方式和 DeepSeek 深度思考模式。
• 优化智慧视觉的交互操作方式。
• 合入安卓 2025 年 8 月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/8
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。
In this update, Assistant has been upgraded to YOYO Assistant. This release also optimizes the interaction experience with Honor Lens. Update to enjoy the improvements.
• Assistant has been upgraded to YOYO Assistant, now supporting new ways to interact, such as sending images and documents, as well as the DeepSeek deep thinking mode.
• Optimizes the interaction experience with Honor Lens.

• Android security patch (Aug 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about Honor Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/8

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any issues during use, please get support by going to My Honor or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
